title: Service disruption due to traction power fault

updates.text: Normal train service has resumed. Free bus service and bridging has ceased. We apologies for the inconvenience.
At 0553 train service resume for Yio Chu Kang to Yishun northbound.
Free bus bridging services activated from Yio Chu Kang to Yishun. Our maintenance engineers are on site trying to rectify the fault.
Due to a traction power fault, there will be no train service from Yio Chu Kang northbound towards Yishun northbound.
